TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DispatchRuntime extends System.Object

summary.span: 公开某些属性，这些属性用于修改默认服务行为以及附加自定义对象，而这些对象可修改将传入消息转换为对象和调度到操作的方式。

span.span: Exposes properties that can be used to modify default service behavior as well as attach custom objects that can modify how incoming messages are transformed into objects and dispatched to operations.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 类可修改服务或单个终结点的默认行为，或将实现自定义修改的对象插入以下一个或全部两个服务进程中：Use the class either to modify the default behavior of a service or individual endpoint, or to insert objects that implement custom modifications to one or both of the following service processes: 1. 将传入消息转换为对象并在服务对象上以方法调用形式释放这些对象。The transformation of incoming messages into objects and releasing those objects as method invocations on a service object. 2. 将响应服务操作调用后收到的对象转换为出站消息。The transformation of objects received from the response to a service operation invocation into outbound messages. 在 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) ，通道和终结点调度程序是负责接受新通道、接收消息、方法调度和调用以及响应处理的服务组件。In Windows Communication Foundation (WCF), the channel and endpoint dispatchers are the service components responsible for accepting new channels, receiving messages, method dispatch and invocation, and response processing. 由 对象公开的每个终结点都具有一个终结点调度程序和一个关联的通道调度程序；此外，参与双工通信的每个客户端还具有用于每个回调终结点的终结点调度程序和通道调度程序。Each endpoint exposed by a object has one endpoint dispatcher and an associated channel dispatcher; in addition, each client that participates in duplex communication also has an endpoint dispatcher and channel dispatcher for each callback endpoint. 通过 ，即使在无法识别消息的情况下，您也可以为特定协定中的所有消息截获和扩展通道或终结点调度程序。The enables you to intercept and extend the channel or endpoint dispatcher for all messages across a particular contract, even when a message is not recognized. 当到达的消息与协定中声明的任何消息均不匹配时，就会将该消息调度到由 属性返回的操作。When a message arrives that does not match any messages declared in the contract it is dispatched to the operation that was returned by the property. 若要截获或扩展针对特定操作的所有消息，请参见 类。To intercept or extend across all messages for a particular operation, see the class. 由 类公开的调度程序扩展性主要包括以下四个方面：There are four main areas of dispatcher extensibility exposed by the class: 1. 调度组件可使用 的属性和由 属性返回的关联通道调度程序的属性，来自定义通道调度程序接受和关闭通道的方式。Dispatch components use the properties of the and those of the associated channel dispatcher returned by the property to customize how the channel dispatcher accepts and closes channels. 此类别包括 和 属性。This category includes the and properties. 2. 可为处理的每个消息自定义消息组件。Message components are customized for each message processed. 此类别包括 、、 和 属性。This category includes the , , , and the properties. 3. 实例组件可自定义服务类型实例的创建、生存期和处理。Instance components customize the creation, lifetime, and disposal of instances of the service type. 有关服务对象生存期的更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information about service object lifetimes, see the property. 此类别包括 和 属性。This category includes the and the properties. 4. 与安全相关的组件可使用以下属性：Security-related components can use the following properties: - 可指示写入审核事件的位置。 indicates where audit events are written. - 可控制服务是否尝试使用传入消息所提供的凭据进行模拟。 controls whether the service attempts to impersonate using the credentials provided by the incoming message. - 可控制是否将成功消息身份验证事件写入由 指定的事件日志。 controls whether successful message authentication events are written to the event log specified by . - 可控制如何设置 属性。 controls how the property is set. - 可指定如何执行授权事件的审核。 specifies how the auditing of authorization events is performed. - 可指定是否要取消显示记录过程中出现的非关键异常。 specifies whether to suppress non-critical exceptions that occur during the logging process. 通常，服务行为（可实现 的对象）、协定行为（可实现 的对象）或终结点行为（可实现 的对象）会将自定义扩展对象分配给 属性或将其插入集合。Typically custom extension objects are assigned to a property or inserted into a collection by a service behavior (an object that implements ), a contract behavior (an object that implements ), or an endpoint behavior (an object that implements ). 然后，以编程方式或通过实现自定义 对象来将安装行为对象添加到相应的行为集合中，这样便能使用应用程序配置文件插入该行为。Then the installing behavior object is added to the appropriate collection of behaviors either programmatically or by implementing a custom object to enable the behavior to be inserted using an application configuration file.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutomaticInputSessionShutdown { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定当客户端关闭输出会话时，服务是否关闭输入会话。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the service closes an input session when the client closes an output session.

value.span: 如果客户端关闭输出会话时服务关闭输入会话，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the service closes an input session when the client closes an output session; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将 属性设置为 `false`，则必须由其他某些机制关闭通道。If you set the property to `false`, the channel must be closed by some other mechanism. 在这种情况下，必须将自定义会话关闭处理程序添加到 属性。In this case, you must add a custom session shutdown handler to the property. 默认情况下，当客户端关闭输出会话且服务已处理完所有剩余消息时，服务器会关闭会话。By default when a client closes an output session and the service has finished processing any remaining messages the server closes the session. 将 设置为 `false` 可阻止服务器自动关闭会话，并启用会话生存期的自定义控件。Setting to `false` prevents the server from automatically closing the session and enables custom control of session lifetimes.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CallbackClientRuntime As ClientRuntime

summary.span: 获取 对象，该对象表示对双工回调终结点的出站调用的 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 扩展安装点。

span.span: Gets the object that represents the installation point for extensions to Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) for outbound calls to a duplex callback endpoint.

value.span: 对象，该对象为双工协定中运行时客户端自定义项的安装点。

span.span: The object that is the installation point for run-time client customization in duplex contracts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 可添加自定义扩展对象，这些对象用于查看或修改将出站消息和响应消息参数转换回返回值的操作。Use the to add custom extension objects that view or modify the conversion of parameters to outbound messages and response messages back into return values. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For details, see .

value.span: 调度运行时对象的通道调度程序。

span.span: The channel dispatcher for the dispatch run-time object.

summary.span: 获取或设置服务的实例是依次还是同时处理消息。

span.span: Gets or sets whether an instance of a service processes messages sequentially or concurrently.

value.span: 一个 对象，该对象控制服务的实例是依次还是同时处理消息。

span.span: A object that controls whether an instance of a service processes messages sequentially or concurrently.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要使用 `Multiple` 并发模式，服务实现必须是线程安全的。The service implementation must be thread-safe to use the `Multiple` concurrency mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可获取与此调度运行时关联的终结点调度程序，以修改或自定义特定于终结点的执行。Use the property to obtain the endpoint dispatcher associated with this dispatch runtime to modify or customize endpoint-specific execution.

value.span: 如果消息按照发送时的顺序调度，则为 ；否则为 。

summary.span: 获取或设置外部授权策略，这些策略可通过给定的声明集，定义一组用于对用户进行授权的规则。

span.span: Gets or sets the external authorization policies that define a set of rules for authorizing a user, given a set of claims.

value.span: 对象的一个 ，这些对象可通过给定的声明集，定义一组用于对用户进行授权的规则。

span.span: A of objects that define a set of rules for authorizing a user, given a set of claims.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可添加 的自定义实现，该接口可通过给定声明集定义一组用于对用户进行授权的规则。Use this property to add a custom implementation of that defines a set of rules for authorizing a user, given a set of claims. 每次调用服务时，均使用此自定义实现。This custom implementation is used every time the service is called.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否忽略 。

span.span: Gets or sets whether to ignore the .

value.span: 如果在执行服务方法时忽略 ，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: , the is ignored when executing the service method; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 允许对其通道使用专有事务流机制的第三方通道开发人员将其事务引入 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 。The allows third-party channel developers who use a proprietary transaction flow mechanism for their channel to introduce their transaction into Windows Communication Foundation (WCF). 如果此属性设置为 `true`，则在执行服务方法时将忽略事务。If this property is set to `true`, the transaction is ignored when executing the service method.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值控制服务是否尝试使用传入消息所提供的凭据进行模拟。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that controls whether the service attempts to impersonate using the credentials provided by the incoming message.

value.span: 如果当操作的 属性值为 或 时，服务尝试根据消息凭据进行模拟，则为 ；如果仅当操作的 属性值为 时服务才尝试进行模拟，则为 。

span.span: if the service attempts to impersonate based on message credentials when an operation's property value is either or ; if the service attempts impersonation only if an operation's property value is .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可控制当操作的 属性值为 时是否进行模拟。Use the property to control whether impersonation is performed when an operation's property value is . 如果该属性为 `true` 但操作的 属性值为 ，则会引发异常。An exception is thrown if the property is `true` but an operation's property value is . 如果操作的 属性值为 ，则始终会尝试模拟。If an operation's property value is impersonation is always attempted.

summary.span: 获取 对象的集合，这些对象可用于添加自定义处理程序以控制如何关闭输入会话。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that can be used to add a custom handler to control how input sessions are closed.

value.span: 类型为 的对象的 。

span.span: A of type objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 对象添加到此属性，可控制关闭输入会话的方式。Add an object to this property to control the manner in which input sessions are closed. 当在 上对 方法的调用首次返回 `null` 时（指示输入会话已关闭），调度程序会调用每个 对象，并将一个 对象传递给该对象。When a call to the method on the first returns `null`, (which indicates that the input session has been closed), the dispatcher invokes each object, passing it an object. 自定义 对象可使用此 对象为每个通道状态执行清理操作，或在关闭通道前发送一条响应消息。Custom objects can use this object to perform clean-up for each channel state or to send a response message before closing the channel.

summary.span: 获取 对象的集合，这些对象可用于在首次创建 对象时对其进行检查或修改。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that can be used to inspect or modify an object when it is first created.

value.span: 类型的一个 对象。

span.span: A object of type .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可添加自定义初始值设定项，该自定义初始值设定项可在首次创建 对象时检查或修改该对象。Use the property to add a custom initializer that can inspect or modify an object when it is first created. 创建 对象的频率由 属性来控制。The frequency with which objects are created is controlled by the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个 对象，可使用该对象控制服务对象的创建和析构。

span.span: Gets or sets an object that you can use to control the creation and destruction of service objects.

value.span: 一个 对象，该对象可控制与 对象关联的服务对象的创建和析构。

span.span: An object that controls the creation and destruction of service objects associated with an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现 接口，并将实现分配给 属性，以便使用无参数构造函数的构造函数来控制服务类型的实例，例如，实现实例池等自定义实例化模式。Implement the interface and assign the implementation to the property to control instances of the service type using a constructor other than the parameterless constructor, for example, to implement a custom instancing mode such as instance pooling. 通常，在首次创建 对象时，会调用一次 方法。Typically the method is invoked once, when the object is first created. 当关闭 对象时，也会调用一次 方法。The method is also invoked once, when the object is closed. 也可以配置一个服务，以在关闭 对象之前释放实例。A service can also be configured to release an instance before the object is closed. 使用 属性或调用 方法，可进行此配置。This can be configured by using the property or by calling the method. 如果此操作已完成，则 对象会调用 方法。If this is done, the object calls the method. 如果新消息在释放实例后到达，则会使用 方法创建一个新实例。If a new message arrives after the instance has been released, a new instance is created using the method.

summary.span: 获取 对象的集合，这些对象可用于在终结点中为所有传入消息和传出消息附加自定义消息检查器。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that can be used to attach a custom message inspector for all incoming and outgoing messages across the endpoint.

value.span: 类型的一个 对象。

span.span: A object of type .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可附加自定义 对象，该对象可检查或转换流过终结点的所有消息。Use the property to attach custom objects that can inspect or transform all messages that flow through the endpoint. 由于 对象可获取对消息的引用，因此可以对其进行缓冲，并检查正文的副本。Because the object gets a reference to the message, you can buffer it and examine a copy of the body.

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that can be used to control the execution behavior of a particular operation.

value.span: 类型为 和 的对象的 。

span.span: A of type and objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可检查或修改参数、控制参数、返回值序列化和反序列化、控制操作调用以及修改某个操作的其他行为。Use the property to inspect or modify parameters, control parameter and return value serialization and deserialization, control operation invocation, and modify other behaviors for a single operation. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For details, see .

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象，该对象可控制对特定消息的目标 的选择。

span.span: Gets or sets the object that controls the selection of a destination for a particular message.

value.span: 对象。

span.span: The object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可决定哪个操作接收给定消息。Use the property to decide which operation receives a given message. 默认操作选择器可返回消息的操作标头的值，该值可用作查找正确 的关键字。The default operation selector returns the value of the action header for the message, which is used as the key to locate the correct . 如果找不到匹配的操作，则调用会被调度到 属性的返回值。If no matching operation is found, the invocation is dispatched to the return value from the property.

value.span: 值之一，默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 为 ，表明未设置 属性。When the is , the property is not set. 如果该值为 ，则会根据传入消息的用户凭据，使用 填充 属性。When the value is the property is populated with a based on the user credentials of the incoming message. 如果值为， 则 使用 基于 ASP.NET 角色信息的对象填充属性。When the value is the property is populated with an object based on ASP.NET role information. 如果该值为 ，则 属性由自定义 实现填充。When the value is the property is populated by a custom implementation.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值控制对哪些服务授权事件进行审核。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that controls what service authorization events are audited.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，不对任何服务授权事件进行审核。In the default case, no service authorization events are audited. 如果 值为 ，则只将成功的服务授权事件写入由 属性指定的审核日志。If the value is , only successful service authorization events are written to the audit log specified by the property. 如果此属性具有一个 值，则只将失败的服务授权事件写入由 属性指定的审核日志。If this property has a value of , only unsuccessful service authorization events are written to the audit log specified by the property. 如果 值为 ，则同时将成功和失败的服务授权事件写入审核日志。If the value is , both successful and failed service authorization events are written to the audit log.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定是否要取消显示记录过程中出现的非关键异常。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to suppress non-critical exceptions that occur during the logging process.

value.span: 如果取消显示记录过程中出现的非关键异常，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if non-critical exceptions that occur during the logging process are suppressed; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果希望对应用程序重新引发写入审核日志过程中发生的异常，请将 设置为 `false`。Set to `false` if you want exceptions that occur during the course of writing the audit log to be re-thrown to the application. 默认情况下，只会对应用程序重新引发因尝试写入审核事件而产生的 、、 和 异常；将取消显示其他所有异常。In the default case, only the , , , and exceptions that result from attempts to write audit events are re-thrown to the application; all other exceptions are suppressed.

summary.span: 获取或设置用于调用服务操作的同步上下文。

span.span: Gets or sets the synchronization context that is used to invoke the service operations.

value.span: 用于确定对哪个线程调用服务操作的 对象。

span.span: The object used to determine on which thread the service operation is invoked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回值可能为 `null`。The return value can be `null`. 如果此值不为 `null`，则此同步上下文用于对正确线程调用服务操作。If this value is not `null`, then this synchronization context is used to invoke the service operations on the correct thread.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定当会话关闭时是否自动完成当前事务。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to automatically complete the current transaction when the session closes.

value.span: 如果会话关闭时自动完成事务，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if transactions automatically complete when the session closes; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为由 指定的值。

span.span: The default is the value specified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 为 `true` 且存在一个活动事务，将在会话关闭时完成该事务。If is `true` and there is an active transaction, the transaction is completed when the session closes. 如果 为 `false`，表明未完成活动事务，并最终会中止这些事务。If is `false`, active transactions are not completed and are eventually aborted.
